container.containing-doc: Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Indians Tribal Code

attachment.heading: 2023 Edition Recodification Table
attachment.text: This table shows the location of former Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Indians Tribal Code sections within the 2023 Edition of the code.

ul.li: renumbered sections, adding a "padded zero" to allow for easy insertion

attachment.text: To find where a new section is located, type the old section number into the box below.
